title: Virtual Clinic MED
description:
Virtual Clinic: Interactive AI-Powered Medical Education Following Objective Structured Clinical Exam Standards

Immerse yourself in lifelike medical scenarios, refine your practical skills, and become a professional healthcare expert.

Medical cases are created from real medical records, featuring:

- Data from 546,551 unique patients,
- Over 39 million laboratory tests,
- Over 3.2 million hospital and outpatient visits,
- More than 800 disease categories.

About the application:

- Engage in simulations based on real medical cases, involving patient interactions, physical exams, and medical test ordering,
- Master diagnostic and treatment planning skills, and revel in the satisfaction of solving medical puzzles,
- Prepare for medical tests and exams; access over 200,000 medical test questions designed by medical professionals and academic lecturers,
- Gain expertise in interpreting various diagnostic tests, including ECG, X-ray, CT, MRI, and more.

Explore a variety of valuable software features, such as:

- Experience test and exam modules for practice and progress tracking.
- An intelligent assistant for error tracking and suggestions for reviews,
-A mobile app for convenient on-the-go learning.

What sets us apart:

- Learn practical skills in a safe, interactive environment,
- Acquire skills required for medical practice,
- Hone communication, diagnosis, and treatment planning skills,
- Gain clinical experience based on real cases from historical health records,
- Enhance your learning experience through the use of Artificial Intelligence.

At the Virtual Clinic, we support your learning through experience:
In the application, users are not passive receivers of knowledge. They are free to act, mastering patient interactions in sometimes difficult circumstances.
After each case, users receive comprehensive feedback. Assessment refers to communication with patients, including the evaluation of empathy.

The application is developed in collaboration with top Medical Universities, offering:

- Access to top-tier educational materials, including medical cases, test questions, and the interpretation of imaging examinations,
- All educational materials have been reviewed by medical professionals and educators from top Polish medical universities.
